Action.author: andrey.goncharov
Action.body: ~danielhardman who should be referenced as a maintainer of DEB packages that we build from pypi (like ioflo, base58 ant etc). Currently it's Evernym. Should we change that to Sovrin?

Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: I think we clarified the answer by email. Right now, Sovrin Foundation is the origin, and Hyperledger is the maintainer for all .deb packages that begin with "indy".

Action.author: alexander.shekhovcov
Action.body: " as a maintainer field for all packages except `sovrin`. The `sovrin` package has "Sovrin Foundation ". The following packages have "Hyperledger " in a maintainer field: packages: indy-node indy-plenum indy-anoncreds 3rd party dependencies: python3-ioflo python3-orderedset python3-base58 python3-prompt-toolkit python3-rlp python3-sha3 python3-raet python3-pyzmq python3-intervaltree python3-ujson python3-portalocker python3-sortedcontainers python3-charm-crypto python3-timeout-decorator >

Action.author: ozheregelya
Action.body: indy-node - Hyperledger indy-plenum - Hyperledger indy-anoncreds - Hyperledger python3-timeout-decorator - Hyperledger python3-rlp - Hyperledger python3-sha3 - Hyperledger python3-ioflo - Hyperledger python3-base58 - Hyperledger python3-sortedcontainers - Hyperledger python3-portalocker - Hyperledger python3-pyzmq - Hyperledger python3-raet - Hyperledger python3-intervaltree - Hyperledger python3-orderedset - Hyperledger python3-charm-crypto - Hyperledger python3-pygments - Ubuntu Developers python3-leveldb - Ubuntu Developers python3-semver - Ubuntu Developers python3-orderedsetp - Ubuntu Developers python3-psutil - Ubuntu Developers python3-pip - Ubuntu Developers python3-psutil - Ubuntu Developers python3-jsonpickle - Ubuntu Developers python3-dateutil - Ubuntu Developers python3-ujson - Ubuntu Developers python3-prompt-toolkit - Ubuntu Developers Packages maintained by Ubuntu Developers are ok, see INDY-709. >
